mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_posting_tb (title, content, manager, email,dead_line, employment_type, number_of_staff, work_type, salary_type, salary, other_salary, working_hours, working_days, working_time,gender, qualifications, etc, location, views, likes, registrar_id,modifier_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{manager}, #{email}, #{deadLine}, #{employmentType},#{numberOfStaff}, #{workType}, #{salaryType}, #{salary}, #{otherSalary}, #{workingHours}, #{workingDays}, #{workingTime}, #{gender}, #{qualifications}, #{etc},#{location}, #{views}, #{likes}, #{registrarId}, #{modifierId})
